description: Detects the deletion of registry keys containing the MSTSC connection history Author: Christian Burkard. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Terminal Server Client Connection History Cleared
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"DeleteValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Microsoft\\Terminal\ Server\ Client\\Default\\MRU*) OR (winlog.event_data.EventType:"DeleteKey" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Microsoft\\Terminal\ Server\ Client\\Servers\\*))
